Detailed Description

The RecordActionClient class handles the action client to record movements.

Definition at line 33 of file recordactionclient.hpp.

void pumpkin_qt::RecordActionClient::recordActiveCallback ( )
private

Action client callback method. It is called when the client receives that the record is just started.

Sets the inner members to check the service is _running.

Definition at line 66 of file recordactionclient.cpp.

void pumpkin_qt::RecordActionClient::recordDoneCallback ( const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState &  goal,
const pumpkin_messages::RecordResultConstPtr &  result 
)
private

Action client callback method. It is called when the client receives the finish of the action by the server.

It will stops the current record, and send a message to the main window with some info.

Parameters
goalThe action record state.
resultThe result message.

Definition at line 72 of file recordactionclient.cpp.

void pumpkin_qt::RecordActionClient::recordFeedbackCallback ( const pumpkin_messages::RecordFeedbackConstPtr &  feedback)
private

Action client callback method. It is called everytime the client receives a feedback from the server.

It will send a message to the main window.

Parameters
feedbackThe feedback message

Definition at line 104 of file recordactionclient.cpp.

void pumpkin_qt::RecordActionClient::recordFile ( )
slot

Request to start recording.

The record may start a bit later calling this method. The record will only starts when the server accept the request.

void pumpkin_qt::RecordActionClient::recordStop ( )
slot

Request to stop recording.

The record may stops a bit later, this is because the record will only stop when the server accepts the request.
